name: World War 2: Rescue Missions
description:
World War Rescue Mission

Help affected citizen of WW2 battleground with your rescue team & provide emergency aid.

Save lives of wounded soldiers! The aftermath of world war 2 rescue duty has come to battle of Okinawa. The rescued Campaign was disastrous as many soldiers injured, various citizens were shot dead, and some were suffering from artillery fire and malnutrition situation. You have to save atrocities soldier, affected persons from bombed catastrophic situation and provide first aid. Perform your uttermost duty to medicare innocents who are Struggling hard for their last breath under the bloodiest assault fps shooting. Call for US Army to provide ambulance emergency aid to all affected persons of battleground survivals.

Hurry up! Save as many lives as possible. Be a world war legend to provide medicines, first aid in health camp, as army soldiers are severe wounded and fighting with illnesses due to armour tanks air attacks. Drive army rescue tank, Us army ambulance in this modern global war survival arcade and Speed up towards pacific fort affected areas. Rush towards health camp with your battle rescue team to provide emergency aid and medication to surviving families at rescue camp.


Help army battle rescue team to escort wounded persons to safe destination, such as care camp in this last rescue city. Do your best to save innocence life and perform army rescue duty in ultimate epic World War Battle Rescue Mission.


Game features:

Realistic battleground environment
Ultimate Rescue survival mission
Drive Us army ambulance to Rescue
Captivating gameplay for battlefield
Easy to handle & Smooth controls
Most bloodiest assault visual effects
Immersive HQ pacific war sounds
